node.title: Traffic worker killed in hit-and-run crash remembered as 'hardworking family man' as hunt continues for driver
node.alt: A red sedan is parked in front of an SES tent, its front comprehensively crushed and crumpled.
node.description: A man killed in a hit-and-run crash in Melbourne's south-east is remembered as a loving father of four, as police say they are on track to findÂ the driver.
node.content:
["A traffic worker killed in a hit-and-run in Melbourne's south-east yesterday was a father of four who is being remembered by his partner as a \"family man\".", "Timmy Rakei, 44, was killed when he was struck by a red Holden travelling well above the speed limit near the intersection of Hall Road and Lats Avenue at Carrum Downs yesterday morning.", "Another worker, Shaun Kilmartin, 38, was also injured and remains in hospital.", "Police are continuing their search for the driver, who fled the scene on foot before he was picked up by a black Hyundai SUV with cloned number plates, which was seen\u00a0travelling east on Ballarto Road.", "The driver has been described as Caucasian in appearance and aged in his 30s.", "", "
Timmy Rakei was a father of four.(Supplied)
", "Mr Rakei and Mr Kilmartin's\u00a0employer Altus Traffic on Tuesday released an updated statement on the incident, including a tribute from Mr Rakei's partner Tania.", "\"Timmy was such a loving and hardworking family man,\" she said.", "\"We are just devastated and it hasn't really sunken in yet.", "Detective Acting Senior Sergeant Jarrod Dwyer said police were \"well and truly on track\" to find the two drivers after photos of the pair were released yesterday.", "", "
A person took photos of the driver before he got into a second car.(Supplied: Victoria Police)
", "\"We've had an outpouring of information coming in from the general public, which has been really, really pleasing,\" he said.", "\"But we're still sifting through that information.\"", "Senior Sergeant Dwyer said police had \"a number of potential suspects\" after countless witnesses\u00a0came forward to provide assistance.", "It is believed the driver may have minor facial injuries from the crash.", "
'Long battle ahead' for injured victim
", "Mr Kilmartin\u00a0was flown to the Royal Melbourne Hospital in a stable condition after being dragged from the road and receiving life-threatening injuries.", "Senior Sergeant Dwyer said his injuries had\u00a0since been downgraded from life-threatening to serious, but he faced\u00a0a \"long battle ahead\".", "Police believe the crash\u00a0was not deliberate. But according to witness accounts, the driver was driving dangerously and well over the speed limit\u00a0before crashing into the worksite. \u00a0", "", "
Police have released this photo of the black Hyundai SUV the driver used to leave\u00a0the scene.(Supplied: Victoria Police)
", "After the crash, at least one passerby stopped to help.\u00a0After the driver started to run away, a member of the public began chasing him.", "That person took photos of the driver as they pursued him and shouted for him to stop, and after that the driver got into the second car.", "When police saw the black SUV nearby a short time later, the vehicle drove at police officers.", "Altus Traffic CEO Ben Marsonet said the company remained heartbroken.", "\"We are doing everything we can to support the families, friends and communities of both Timmy and Shaun, as well as their colleagues,\" he said.", "\"This was a tragedy, initiated by a callous individual who left the scene once he realised what he had done.\u00a0", "\"Our staff and all people who work on the roads deserve better.\"", "Acting Senior Sergeant Dwyer said authorities were \"pulling out all stops\" to find the driver from the crash and the driver of the car that picked him up.", "Anyone who witnessed the crash or has dashcam footage of the incident has been asked to contact CrimeStoppers on 1800 333 000, or triple-0 if they have seen the black Hyundai."]
